author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r39775, which showed an issue with not properly deleted
working copy properties, make svn_wc_delete4() delete working copy properties
of files it removes from version control.
(svn_wc_delete4): When deleting a schedule add file, also remove its

author: rhuijben
msg: Remove the direct dependency on access batons from svn_wc_add4().
Use the wc-db api for accessing the to be added path, to reduce the
number of exceptional behaviors in entry handling caused by existing
but unversioned directories which where all eaten by svn_wc_entry().
(svn_wc_add4): Use wc_db api for checking existing nodes. Switch to
absolute paths for processing. Only retrieve the access baton
where still need it for compatibility.
(exclude_keeps_hidden_entries): Allow absolute path in error message.

author: rhuijben
msg: Use the newer, not-deprecated revert api.

author: rhuijben
msg: Remove a few more access batons and entries and at the same time make
the libsvn_client property functions return the paths in the relative
path format pre 1.7 users expect: always based on the passed anchor.
Our testsuite doesn't test proplist output with depth for exact output,
so it didn't catch this api change.
(propget_walk_baton): Add anchor/abspath pair to allow returning
(propget_walk_cb): Implement node walker and set relative path
(get_prop_from_wc): Remove access baton argument and update
(svn_client_propget3): Check node kind and existance instead of
(proplist_walk_cb): Calculate relative path, so users still using access
batons can use the returned paths to perform operations.
(svn_client_proplist3): Verify existence and store anchor/abspath pair.
